about_the_game:
Harbor piers, bridges over rivers, scaffolding at construction sites... This wooden platform pack can be used not only as decorative objects in towns and landscapes, but also as gimmicks for solving mysteries.
There are a variety of parts available, from simple parts such as boards and legs to more complex combinations of these parts, allowing you to create various scenes depending on your creativity.
The simple asset of wood can be used in any type of worldview.

The pack's models are combined to include a variety of gimmicks, and there is a sample map that can be used as a reference for how to use them in a game.

[Wooden Platform Pack - Contents]
-- 3D Stamps
Simple Parts: 12
Combined Parts: 15
Parts of Stamps Combined with Each Other by Using Subgraphics: 12

-- Sample Map: 1 (There are gimmicks that combine the contents of the pack.)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphic board that works with OpenGL 4.4 or higher
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Performance is not guaranteed under a virtual or emulated environment.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Core i5-8400 / Ryzen 5 1500X or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce™ GTX1650 AMD Radeon™ RX570
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Performance is not guaranteed under a virtual or emulated environment.

short_description: This is a pack of wooden platform parts that can be combined to create various objects such as harbor piers, bridges over rivers, scaffolding at construction sites, gimmicks for solving mysteries, and so on.
